level.text: The Director shall determine limitations on the license capacity using the following criteria:
Occupancy limits established by the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs and/or by the Department of Fire and Emergency Medical Services;
Program space requirements, as provided in sections 340, 341, 342, 350, 353 and 355 of this Chapter;
Lavatory requirements, as provided in section 361 of this Chapter; and
Maximum adult/child ratios and group size requirements, as established in section 343 of this Chapter.

Any Facility desiring a change in its license capacity shall submit a written request to the Director, accompanied by written documentation verifying that the Facility can maintain compliance with the requirements of this Chapter if the change is granted.
